QViewportobject

Details

This Special allows the player character to see objects in remote rooms once they have been viewed via a Viewport. [DEFINED ON VIEWPORT EXTENSION]

viewport.t[257]

When the VIEWPORT EXTENSION is in use, make objects in remote rooms visisble once they have been viewed via a Viewport. Adv3Lite Library Reference Manual
